items.content_html: TaskHub for Employees is a lightweight employee management system to simplify task handling. Admins can create tasks, assign them, track progress (Completed, Pending, Failed), and forward tasks. Employees can view, accept, or forward tasks and update statuses. Built with React.js, JavaScript, and Local Storage, it’s efficient and backend-free.
items.title: JayDev078/TaskHub-for-Employees: TaskHub for Employees is a lightweight employee management system to simplify task handling. Admins can create tasks, assign them, track progress (Completed, Pending, Failed), and forward tasks. Employees can view, accept, or forward tasks and update statuses. Built with React.js, JavaScript, and Local Storage, it’s efficient and backend-free.
